subject: p15192710
History: Followup of the patient with chest tube discontinued.
Findings: AP chest radiograph is reviewed. As compared to the prior studies obtained the day earlier there is no interval development of substantial pneumothorax, although minimal amount of air cannot be excluded in the apex. Left lower lobe opacity might represent organizing hematoma. Subcutaneous air is unchanged.
